Clip.Title: TITANIC: THE BAND PLAYED ON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When the RMS Titanic set sail across the Atlantic from Southampton on her maiden voyage 100 years ago, she made history. Most potent of all was that of the band standing on deck, bravely playing on until the last lifeboat had left and there was no hope of escape.

Clip.Title: U455 - THE MYSTERY OF THE LOST SUBMARINE
Clip.Episode: U455 - The Mystery of the Lost Submarine
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In summer 2008, a mysterious submarine was discovered off the coast of Italy at 120 meters deep. For Lorenzo del Veneziano, an underwater marine archeologist, it was an amazing sight, as the submarine was intact! Could this be the wreck of the long lost U-455, the last missing German U-boat from World War II?

Clip.Title: TITANIC'S FINAL MYSTERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: One century after the sinking of the Titanic, a 20-year investigation reveals the unusual set of circumstances that ultimately led to the ship's tragic demise. Travel back 100 years and witness what really happened in the final hours before and after the Titanic collision.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Heading Southwest from the Fraser Canyon - BC's lower Mainland is a mix of remote mountain ranges, spectacular cityscapes and diverse Marine life - as the Fraser River meets the open waters of the Pacific.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From St. John's heading north, the Newfoundland coastline is a maze of iconic bays and inlets - from world-famous Fogo Island, to the abandoned fishing settlements along the island's Northern peninsula.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: A PARK FOR ALL SEASONS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Above the Arctic Circle, in Canada's far north sits Auyuittuq National Park. This remote wilderness is home to polar bears, massive glaciers and Mount Thor-one of the sharpest sheer drops to be found on the planet. 'Auyuittuq' means 'The Land That Never Melts' in Inutituk, the language of the Inuit. However, research reports rising temperatures and this once frozen landscape is changing.

Clip.Title: A PARK FOR ALL SEASONS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Known as the 'Canadian Galapagos,' Gwaii Haanas National Park Reserve shelters some of the most lush and remote landscapes in the continent. Home to the Haida Nation for over 10,000 years, the area's coasts and ancient spruce forests are rich in cultural treasure as well as natural life.

Clip.Title: OL PEJETA DIARIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The death of a wild black rhino after a fight with another dominant male and a 14 year old blind black rhino becomes the new ambassador for the species.

Clip.Title: OL PEJETA DIARIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The mass relocation of an endangered species of hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta so the land can be resettled by refugees.

Clip.Title: SUPER SPIDER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Spiders suffer a bad reputation. With more than 40,000 species recorded around the world, they are great research subjects for scientists. Meet the creature you have been taught to fear, and discover its most incredible behavior.

Clip.Title: BLACK MAMBA: KISS OF DEATH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The bite of the black mamba is known by South African locals as the "kiss of death." A single strike can deliver enough neurotoxic venom to kill 15 grown men. It has one of Africa's worst reputations, but does it deserve its bad rap? Behind the bad press lies a mercurial reptile that is quite shy. Follow a female mamba looking for a home to incubate her eggs while avoiding her main enemy: humans. Then join snake bounty hunter Simon Keys, whose black mamba sanctuary offers a unique look at the secret behavior of this much-maligned snake.

Clip.Title: OL PEJETA DIARIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The death of a wild black rhino after a fight with another dominant male and a 14 year old blind black rhino becomes the new ambassador for the species.

Clip.Title: OL PEJETA DIARIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The mass relocation of an endangered species of hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta so the land can be resettled by refugees.
